用Bohr Chat 一键读论文，用AI 实现辅助阅读。
Bohr Chat 是一个强大的AI工具，能够一键读论文并实现辅助阅读。
其特点包括：
1. 高效快速：通过AI技术，能够迅速解析并理解论文内容。
2. 智能摘要：自动生成论文摘要，提炼关键信息，节省时间。
3. 交互问答：用户可以通过对话形式提问，AI提供即时解答。

Using Bohr Chat for one-click paper reading and AI-assisted reading.
Bohr Chat is a powerful AI tool that enables one-click paper reading and AI-assisted reading. 
Its features include:
1. Efficient and Fast: Quickly analyzes and understands paper content using AI technology.
2. Smart Summarization: Automatically generates paper summaries, extracting key information to save time.
3. Interactive Q&A: Users can ask questions in a conversational format, and the AI provides instant answers.
